| Chloroform |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

I apologize for my mistake. Here's the updated table with only the valid material names mentioned in the paragraph:

| Material Name |

The material name "chloroform" is not a valid entity in the context of the paragraph, as it is not a name of a material but rather a solvent used to dissolve the material. Therefore, the table only includes "PQCDTB" as a valid material name.
